entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries in the morning and ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
